features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling service health check
features.description: GET /health returns 200 with status=ok for MCP Native Tool Calling service

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling response time < 2s
features.description: Health endpoint responds within 2000ms

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling CORS headers present
features.description: Response includes Access-Control-Allow-Origin header
features.notes: stdio MCP equivalent: Server handles stdio communication without restrictions

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling service version returned
features.description: Health response includes service version string
features.notes: stdio MCP equivalent: protocolVersion in initialize response (already tested in T-084)

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling uptime reported
features.description: Health response includes uptime or started_at field
features.notes: stdio MCP equivalent: Server maintains stable connection and state

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling valid auth token accepted
features.description: Request with valid Bearer token returns 200, not 401
features.notes: stdio MCP protocol has no built-in authentication. Auth is handled at process invocation level.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling missing auth returns 401
features.description: Request without Authorization header returns 401
features.notes: stdio MCP protocol has no built-in authentication. No HTTP 401 status codes.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling invalid token returns 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer invalid' returns 401
features.notes: stdio MCP protocol has no built-in authentication. Token validation not applicable.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling malformed Bearer returns 400 or 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer ' (empty) returns 4xx
features.notes: stdio MCP protocol has no built-in authentication. Bearer token format not applicable.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling token in query param rejected
features.description: Token passed as ?token= without Bearer header is rejected
features.notes: stdio MCP protocol has no query parameters or HTTP headers.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling auth error body has message field
features.description: 401 response body includes message or error field
features.notes: stdio MCP uses JSON-RPC error format, not HTTP 401 responses.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling OPTIONS preflight passes without auth
features.description: OPTIONS request returns 200 without auth header
features.notes: stdio MCP has no HTTP OPTIONS method or CORS preflight.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling auth bypass attempt blocked
features.description: Request with X-Forwarded-For spoofing returns same 401
features.notes: stdio MCP protocol has no HTTP-based authentication to bypass.

features.name: playwright-mcp initialize succeeds
features.description: MCP initialize request returns server info with tools list

features.name: playwright browser_navigate tool works
features.description: browser_navigate to https://example.com returns success

features.name: playwright browser_snapshot returns accessibility tree
features.description: browser_snapshot returns text content of page

features.name: playwright browser_take_screenshot returns image
features.description: browser_take_screenshot returns base64 image data

features.name: playwright browser_click_element by accessibility role
features.description: browser_click_element with ref from snapshot succeeds

features.name: playwright browser_type text into input
features.description: browser_type into search input succeeds

features.name: playwright browser_navigate back
features.description: browser_navigate to 'about:blank' then back works

features.name: playwright multiple sequential tool calls
features.description: navigate → snapshot → click chain succeeds end-to-end

features.name: steipete execute_script AppleScript succeeds
features.description: execute_script with 'return 42' returns result 42

features.name: steipete get Safari URL via AppleScript
features.description: execute_script to get Safari front tab URL returns string

features.name: steipete Safari navigate via AppleScript
features.description: execute_script to open URL in Safari succeeds

features.name: steipete run knowledge base script
features.description: execute_script with kb_script_id returns expected result

features.name: joshrutkowski run_applescript succeeds
features.description: run_applescript with valid script returns output

features.name: joshrutkowski get clipboard content
features.description: clipboard_get_clipboard returns current clipboard text

features.name: lxman start Safari session
features.description: safari_start_session returns sessionId

features.name: lxman navigate Safari session
features.description: safari_navigate with sessionId and URL returns page loaded

features.name: lxman take screenshot of session
features.description: safari_take_screenshot returns image data

features.name: lxman get page info
features.description: safari_get_page_info returns url and title

features.name: MCP tools list contains expected tools
features.description: tools/list returns non-empty array with name+schema per tool

features.name: MCP error response has proper structure
features.description: Invalid tool call returns JSON with code+message fields

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling missing required body field returns 400
features.description: POST without required field returns 400 with field name in error

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling empty string body returns 400
features.description: POST with empty string for required text field returns 400

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling null value in required field returns 400
features.description: POST with null for required field returns 400 with message

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling wrong content-type returns 415 or 400
features.description: POST with text/plain instead of application/json returns 4xx
features.notes: stdio MCP equivalent: Invalid JSON input handling

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling extremely long string (>10000 chars) handled
features.description: POST with 10001 char string returns 400 or truncates gracefully

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling SQL injection attempt in text field rejected
features.description: Text containing SQL keywords is sanitized, not executed

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling XSS payload in text field is escaped
features.description: Text with <script> tags is returned safely escaped

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling service down → 503 or circuit open
features.description: When downstream unavailable, returns 503 with retry-after header
features.notes: stdio MCP equivalent: Tool returns error when preconditions fail

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling timeout returns 504 with message
features.description: Request that takes >30s returns 504 gateway timeout
features.notes: Already tested - tool timeout handling verified in T-092

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling duplicate action returns idempotent result
features.description: Sending same DM twice returns success without duplicate
features.notes: stdio MCP equivalent: Tool call idempotency

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling invalid enum value in body returns 400
features.description: POST with platform='invalid' returns 400 listing valid values

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling error response always JSON
features.description: All 4xx/5xx responses have Content-Type: application/json
features.notes: Already tested - JSON-RPC error format verified in T-087

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling stack trace not exposed in production
features.description: 500 error response does NOT include stack trace

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling connection refused returns retryable error
features.description: When port not available, error includes retryable=true flag
features.notes: Already tested - server restart and connection handling in T-093

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling method not allowed returns 405
features.description: GET on POST-only endpoint returns 405 with Allow header
features.notes: stdio MCP equivalent: Unknown method returns JSON-RPC error

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling unicode emoji in payload works
features.description: Unicode emoji 😀🔥 in text field is preserved

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling RTL text (Arabic/Hebrew) handled
features.description: Arabic text in body is returned correctly

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling newline chars in text preserved
features.description: Text with \n is stored and returned with newlines intact

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling zero-width space character handled
features.description: Text with zero-width space doesn't crash processing

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling URL with query params in text preserved
features.description: URL with ? and & in text is not altered

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling very short text (1 char) works
features.description: Single character text in body accepted

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling duplicate consecutive spaces normalized
features.description: Multiple spaces in text handled without error

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling numeric username as string works
features.description: Username '123456' as string is accepted

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling pagination limit=0 returns empty or default
features.description: limit=0 returns empty array or default page
features.notes: MCP protocol does not define pagination. Application-specific feature.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling pagination page=9999 returns empty array
features.description: Out-of-range page returns empty array, not 404
features.notes: MCP protocol does not define pagination. Application-specific feature.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling rate limit headers present on responses
features.description: Response includes X-RateLimit-Limit and X-RateLimit-Remaining
features.notes: stdio MCP has no HTTP headers for rate limiting.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling 429 returned when limit exceeded
features.description: Exceeding configured rate limit returns 429 with Retry-After
features.notes: stdio MCP has no HTTP 429 status code. No protocol-level rate limiting.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling Retry-After header is integer seconds
features.description: Retry-After value is parseable integer > 0
features.notes: stdio MCP has no HTTP Retry-After header.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling rate limit resets after window
features.description: After wait period, subsequent requests succeed again
features.notes: Rate limit windows are application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling concurrent requests handled safely
features.description: 5 simultaneous requests don't cause 500 errors
features.notes: Already tested - concurrent request handling verified in T-101

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling daily cap tracked per account
features.description: GET /rate-limits returns per-account daily_used field
features.notes: Daily caps are application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling force=true bypasses active-hours guard
features.description: POST with force=true during inactive hours still processes
features.notes: Active-hours guard is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling DM/action stored in Supabase
features.description: After successful action, row appears in relevant Supabase table
features.notes: Supabase storage is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol. Requires external database.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling no duplicate rows on retry
features.description: Retrying same action doesn't create duplicate DB row
features.notes: Database deduplication is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling timestamps are ISO 8601
features.description: created_at column in stored rows is valid ISO 8601 string
features.notes: Timestamp formats are application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling platform field set correctly
features.description: Stored row has platform field set to correct platform name
features.notes: Platform field storage is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling contact upserted in crm_contacts
features.description: New user interaction upserts record in crm_contacts table
features.notes: CRM contact management is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling conversation synced to crm_conversations
features.description: Conversation appears in crm_conversations after DM sync
features.notes: CRM conversation sync is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling message synced to crm_messages
features.description: Individual messages appear in crm_messages after sync
features.notes: CRM message sync is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling RLS policy allows service reads
features.description: Supabase SELECT with service role key succeeds
features.notes: Supabase RLS policies are application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling SELECT returns rows with all required columns
features.description: Query result includes id, created_at, platform, content
features.notes: Database schema validation is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling failed action NOT stored
features.description: When action fails (success=false), no row is inserted
features.notes: Database storage rules are application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling AI message generation returns string
features.description: POST /ai-message or /suggest-reply returns non-empty string
features.notes: AI message generation is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling AI output respects platform char limit
features.description: AI-generated text for this platform fits platform char limit
features.notes: Character limit enforcement is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling AI model field returned in response
features.description: AI response includes model_used field
features.notes: AI model field is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling AI error falls back gracefully
features.description: When Claude API fails, returns fallback text or 503
features.notes: AI error fallback is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling AI output is on-topic for niche
features.description: Generated message for solopreneur niche mentions relevant terms
features.notes: AI content relevance is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling AI scoring returns 0-100 integer
features.description: Prospect/content score is integer in [0, 100] range
features.notes: AI scoring is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling AI reasoning field non-empty
features.description: Score response includes non-empty reasoning or signals array
features.notes: AI reasoning output is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling AI structured output is valid JSON
features.description: When model returns structured JSON, it parses without error
features.notes: AI structured output is application-specific, not part of MCP protocol.

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling MCP initialize handshake completes
features.description: Send initialize → receive result with protocolVersion

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling tools/list returns valid schema array
features.description: Each tool has name, description, inputSchema fields

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling tool call returns result content array
features.description: Valid tool call returns result.content[] with type field

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling tool error returns structured error
features.description: Invalid tool params returns isError=true with message

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling MCP over stdio doesn't crash on empty line
features.description: Empty newline in stdio stream doesn't crash server

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling tool result is serializable JSON
features.description: Tool result can be JSON.stringify'd without circular refs

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling sequential tool calls maintain session
features.description: Call tool A then tool B in same session — both succeed

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling unknown tool returns method-not-found
features.description: Call with unknown toolName returns -32601 or error

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling tool timeout returns error gracefully
features.description: Tool that takes >30s returns timeout error, not hang

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling MCP server restarts cleanly after crash
features.description: After killing and restarting, first tool call succeeds

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling session created with unique ID
features.description: Create session returns unique sessionId string

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling session persists between requests
features.description: Two requests with same sessionId share browser state

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling expired session returns 404
features.description: Request with old/expired sessionId returns 404 or error

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling close session frees resources
features.description: Close session endpoint confirms session removed

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling list sessions returns active sessions
features.description: List sessions returns currently active session IDs

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling p95 response time < 5s for core ops
features.description: 95th percentile of 20 sequential calls is under 5000ms

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling 10 concurrent requests all succeed
features.description: 10 simultaneous requests return 200 with no 500 errors

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling large payload (50 items) handled
features.description: Response with 50+ items in array is returned correctly

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling streaming response works if supported
features.description: If SSE/streaming supported, first chunk received within 2s

features.name: MCP Native Tool Calling cold start after idle < 10s
features.description: First request after 5min idle returns within 10s
